meanings.sent1: The yabbies scuttled along the riverbed.
meanings.sent2: We went to the lake to catch some yabbies for our science project.
meanings.sent3: The yabbies threw a party in the pond last night.
meanings.sent4: The yabbies in the stream were like tiny underwater dancers.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the colorful yabbies in the creek.

meanings.definition: The act of catching or fishing for yabbies.
meanings.sent1: Fishing for yabbies is a popular summer activity in this town.
meanings.sent2: We set up traps to lure the yabbies into our buckets.
meanings.sent3: The yabbies outsmarted the fishermen and stole their bait.
meanings.sent4: The competition for the biggest yabbies was fierce among the kids.
meanings.sent5: The yabbies were elusive, making them a challenge to catch.

meanings.definition: The yabbies were delicious when cooked.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's yabbies stew was a family favorite during holidays.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a mouthwatering dish of garlic butter yabbies.
meanings.sent3: The yabbies in the pot were having a hot tub party.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the sizzling yabbies filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The yabbies were so tasty, they melted in your mouth.
